meanings.definition: A substance used to cool or reduce the temperature of something.
meanings.sent1: The coolants in the car engine help prevent it from overheating.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to regularly check the level of coolants in your radiator.
meanings.sent3: The coolants in the fridge were working so hard, they threw a tiny ice party!
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted as coolants in the heated argument, diffusing the tension.
meanings.sent5: The coolants flowed through the system like a refreshing stream, bringing relief to the overheated machinery.
